name: Bella
description: Bella is a beautiful 3-year-old black dog with a heart of gold! She's been waiting patiently for her forever home for a year now, and she's ready to shower her new family with love and energy. Bella is incredibly friendly, loves to play fetch and go for walks, and would make a wonderful companion for an active family. She's in excellent health, is fully vaccinated, and has been patiently waiting for a family to call her own.  Could Bella be the perfect addition to your home?
